name: Money or Love
description:
Can you answer this question easily?
If you want to answer this question that everyone has been asking each other for centuries, you are in the right place.
Make your choice and you decide how to move your life forward.
What kind of life will you live on this road where you can experience different scenarios?
developers: YAMY STUDIO YAZILIM VE OYUN GELISTIRME ANONIM SIRKETI
publishers: YAMY STUDIO YAZILIM VE OYUN GELISTIRME ANONIM SIRKETI
